name: Tesseract VR
description: Tesseract VR is a puzzle game placed in a fantastic environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5 4590- equivalent Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 6600- equivalent Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 1 GB available space
